values.desc: Waits for another thread to arrive at this exchange point (unless the current thread is Thread#interrupt), and then transfers the given object to it, receiving its object in return.

values.code: exchange(x: V, timeout: Long, unit: TimeUnit!)
values.desc: Waits for another thread to arrive at this exchange point (unless the current thread is Thread#interrupt or the specified waiting time elapses), and then transfers the given object to it, receiving its object in return.
